TopicTitle: You have 10,000 of whatever is in your profile picture. What do you do?

Articles.Content: 10,000 novice engineers named Hanson. I first give them numbers, and send 9,999 of them to build me a starship to send me to Vall (my favorite KSP object) and build a base there. Hanson #666 I burn in holy water, and while he’s koffing I burn him in the exhaust of the Rocket of Doom™️
10,000 disoriented kerbals? They will *totally* not destroy the KSC on accident. *cough cough*

10.000 curiositys rover?

Say goodbye to the cats from the planet earth!

wait, where am i?
An empire of flashy astronauts? Sign me up!

10,000 GTX 1080 Ti?

I need an SLI bridge now!

10,000 Kerbals?

Sell them to the clinics for experiments.
Florida Nation, Rise Up! Florida Men, this is our hour! Thank you, Elon Musk, for the missiles.

10,000 dunas?

Probably screw up the entire solar system.
10,000 flying penguins?  Start my own airforce

One can never have too many BoolDogs!*

There'll be a bunch of ppl looking for their left arms though, but we can always set the dogs on them... There will be an absurd amount of licking - Ten thousand faces will be covered in slobber! 

 

*Not a typo; "BoolDog Games" is the name of my startup game studio. My avatar was the original logo for it. 

It is based on a real dog, though the arm is purely fictional - 10k of my dog would indeed result in an apocalyptic amount of face licking

 

Edited October 5, 2020 by Moach

Wait, 10,000 astroneers? I'm pretty sure Exo Dynamics only allows 8 astroneers in a solar system at once due to lag too many astroneers to keep track of, and Exo Dynamics is only studying 5 solar systems right now, so I don't think that would be possible.

Edited October 20, 2020 by probe137

10000 Saturns?

The total mass is about 3 times the sun, so I can probably build a solar system with this much material.

5 minutes ago, Space Nerd said:

10000 Saturns?

The total mass is about 3 times the sun, so I can probably build a solar system with this much material.

or obliterating the Solar System due to the N-Body Physics.
Smash them together to make a real planet.

Just now, catloaf said:

Smash them together to make a real planet.

You mean the 3rd biggest planet. Pluto is 0.00651 of Earth. Jupiter is 11,321. Multiply Pluto by 10,000, and you get 65.1 Earths. Just bigger than Uranus at 63 Earths.

As for my avatar, 

On 10/5/2020 at 12:25 PM, GuessingEveryDay said:

Florida Nation, Rise Up! Florida Men, this is our hour! Thank you, Elon Musk, for the missiles.

51 minutes ago, GuessingEveryDay said:

You mean the 3rd biggest planet. Pluto is 0.00651 of Earth. Jupiter is 11,321. Multiply Pluto by 10,000, and you get 65.1 Earths. Just bigger than Uranus at 63 Earths.

As for my avatar, 

 

I imagine a lot of mass would be lost in the collisions, but it would still definitely be big.

Edited October 8, 2020 by catloaf

If there is some reason to make the huge crowd of identical Sagume’s angry, then... get burnt and lacerated.

That’s what I will do because that is all I can do.

I make a housing district and make the houses identical, Make a HOA democracy (You vote for president and rules.), and potentially sell the blueprints to other company's.

I am well aware that it sounds like I thought long about this, I did not.

with 10,000 dunas I will harvest their ultra density with questionable scientific methods and form a pyschic connection with the atoms in the dunas to create a quantum singularity to destroy the entire universe!

Spoiler
Now that i've updated my profile pic, i'm more likely going to send kerbals to the mun(?) all thanks to me...
Still need an SLI bridge....
10,000 previewless f̹̲̯͕i̩͉̘̮̳̍s̠̄̌͗ͤ̇h̰͈̗̬̪͂e̺͗? Put them on Laythe, wait 168.912 billion years, and realize they've colonized Laythe, along with the entirety of Jool somehow.
10,000 Marvin the Martian..  sell them on ebay for $10 a piece.

On 10/13/2020 at 8:41 AM, Commodore_32 said:

Still need an SLI bridge....

Or a profile pic update to RTX 3090?

(Don't worry though, I still have a GTX 1060)

10,000 calvin and hobbes? Time to wonder how calvins duplicator managed to deliver such a thing, then worry how im going to handle 10,000 tigers. Anyone know a good preserve that will take some tigers? Tuna is required to be on site. Blame Hobbes lol.
